item.title: Webflow Essentials: Beginner's Guide to Building Beautiful Websites
item.dc:creator: tochukwu
item.content:encoded:
Course Description

Are you a creative individual looking to take your ideas to the next level? If you're tired of running out of inspiration, we have the perfect solution for you! Join our Skillshare course led by AI expert Jesper Dramsch, where you'll explore the exciting world of generative AI and discover how ChatGPT can revolutionize your content creation process. Itdoesnt matter if you're a writer, blogger, social media influencer, or any type of content creator, this course is tailored to provide you with the tools and knowledge to keep your ideas flowing endlessly. Dive into the inner workings of ChatGPT, unlock its full potential, and find your unique voice in the realm of AI-assisted writing. Throughout the course, you'll uncover the mysteries of large language models, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and machine learning. Gain valuable insights into how ChatGPT generates creative and coherent responses, and learn to leverage its capabilities to generate an abundance of content ideas. But that's not all! You'll also explore the ethical considerations surrounding generative AI, developing a deeper understanding of the technology behind ChatGPT. Jesper will guide you through practical exercises and provide expert tips to help you make the most of this powerful AI writing tool. As a special bonus, you'll receive Jesper's ebook, "chatGPT for Creatives and Content Creators," serving as a valuable resource to reinforce what you've learned throughout the course. Are you ready to unlock your creative potential and elevate your content creation to new heights? Enroll in the course today and become a master of AI-assisted writing with ChatGPT. Let your imagination soar like never before!

item.title: Digital Product Design: Build a Flexible Design System That Lasts - Part 2
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded:
Course Description

In Part 2 of our Digital Product Design series, we dive deeper into the art and science of creating a flexible design system that stands the test of time. Building on the fundamentals covered in Part 1, this advanced course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to take your design system to the next level. Whether you're a seasoned designer or just starting your journey, this course will empower you to create cohesive, adaptable, and user-friendly digital products.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Throughout the course, students will work on an extended design project where they apply advanced design system principles. This project will involve creating complex UI components, ensuring responsiveness, conducting user testing, and documenting the design system's evolution.
Design software (e.g., Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch) Prototyping tools Collaboration and version control platforms Access to user testing resources Project management tools for design teams

By the end of Part 2 of this course, you will have the expertise to build and maintain a robust, adaptable design system that can elevate the quality and consistency of your digital product designs. Whether you're working as an independent designer or within a team, this course will empower you to create design systems that endure and excel in today's dynamic digital landscape.

item.title: Crash Course on Statistics
item.dc:creator: instructor@example.com
item.content:encoded: Statistics is a fundamental field of study that empowers us to make sense of data, draw meaningful conclusions, and make informed decisions in various disciplines, from science and business to everyday life. This crash course on statistics provides a concise and accessible overview of essential statistical concepts, tools, and techniques. Whether you're a student looking to grasp the basics or a professional seeking a quick refresher, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to understand and work with data effectively.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Definition of Statistics Importance of Statistics in Various Fieldsx Descriptive vs. Inferential Statistics
Marketing and Sales Executives, Healthcare Administrators, Financial Managers, Accountants, and Data Scientists.

Throughout the course, students will have the opportunity to work on practical exercises and mini-projects to apply the statistical concepts they've learned. These exercises will include data analysis tasks, hypothesis testing, and creating visualizations.

By the end of this crash course, you will have a solid foundation in statistics, enabling you to understand data, make informed decisions, and apply statistical concepts in your academic or professional pursuits. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refresh your statistical knowledge, this course will empower you with the essential skills needed to work with data effectively.

What is Lorem Ipsum?

Lorem Ipsumis simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

Why do we use it?

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).
 

Where does it come from?

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32. The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

item.title: mobile nav
item.dc:creator: tochukwu
item.content:encoded:
IntroductionSupportRequirementVideo Guide and Installation Content Management
  • Header Builder
  • Footer Builder
  • Setup Menu
  • Setup Page
LNX Theme Settings
  • General Setting
  • Header Setting
  • Footer Setting
  • Breadcrumb Setting
  • Style Setting
  • Typography Setting
  • Blog Setting
  • Page Setting
  • Portfolio Setting
  • Course Setting
  • Dashboard Setting
    • Product Setting
    • Shop Setting
  • Demo Importer
  • Import / Export
Post TypeElementor IntegrationLenxel DashboardMy Courses > ViewCoursesCertificateAnnouncementFrequently Asked Questions

Introduction

Hi, and welcome to the Lenxel User Guide.

Lenxel is a learning management system based on WordPress theme and plugins, it allows learners to easily interact with learning materials and provides adequate follow-up progress on courses.

The User Guide covers all the information needed to use the Lenxel theme to build an amazing Learning management system, as well as some helpful tips and tricks that will make your experience working with the Lenxel theme easier and more enjoyable.

If you need any additional assistance while using our theme, you can always submit a quote to https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or chat with us through live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com and our support team will be glad to help you out.

Support

Feel free to ask for help from our support team, all you have to do is submit your question via support@example.com If you are unable to find your answer here in our documentation

Requirements

  • PHP 7.x+
  • max_execution_time = 600
  • max_input_time = 1000
  • upload_max_filesize = 64M
  • post_max_size = 64M
  • memory_limit = 256M
  • max_input_vars = 1000
  • MySQL 5.6+
  • WordPress
  • Set permalink to support Lenxel theme by going to wp dashboard -> settings -> permalink, and check the radio box Post name. Click on the button Save Changes.

Whats included

  • Plugins - contains all required plugins theme installation.
  • Demo- contains all sample content that allows the website to be imported manually.
  • Licensing - Contains text files license required for theme upgrade or support.
  • Guide - The folder is a contact document that guides you to install and setup the lenxel theme.
  • Lenxel - Contains the codes to install in the theme.

Video Guide and Installation

Tone of the two following installation methods:

WordPress upload

For most users, this is probably the simplest installation method. To install the Lenxel theme using this method, please follow these steps:
  • Login to your WordPress admin panel
  • Navigate to Appearance > Themes > Add New > Upload Theme
  • Click on Choose File and select lenxel.zip
  • Click on Install Now

FTP upload

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Extract the lenxel.zip file you previously located. You should now see a folder named lenxel
  • Using an FTP client, login to the server where your WordPress website is hosted
  • Using an FTP client, navigate to the /wp-content/themes/ directory under your WordPress website's root directory
  • Using an FTP client, upload the previously extracted lenxel folder to the themes directory on your remote server
  • Once the installation is complete, your Lenxel theme will be ready for use. Now all you need to do is navigate to Appearance > Themes and activate the Lenxel theme. After you have done this, click on the just activated theme or alternatively Apperance > install plugins to install and activate all the required plugins. After you have done this you should see Theme Setting appear in the left navigation bar of your WordPress admin panel.

Setup Demo:

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Navigate to Theme Setting > demo importer Click on the import button to import the sample data.
https://www.loom.com/share/f1209892eac144b0b8638db4785af8e3?sid=99b1a08d-40dd-422f-a9ee-4b981ace3d04

Header Builder

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Header Builder
  • Design your header with elementor (lnx logo, menu, search e.t.c) to suit your desire design / Edit LNX Logo as desired.
  • Add and edit LNX Navigation Menu element on Header builder

Set Default header

  • Update logo(Theme setting > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Enable/Disable Search, Cart, Profile Photo(Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Setup Mobile logo (Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)

Activate Header Builder Design

  • Set the default header through WP dashboard -> Lnx Theme Settings -> Header Options > Header layout
  • Add, edit, and manage the header

Single page header setup

  • To set dynamic Headers for each page, go to the selected page and set the Footer

Footer Builder

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Theme Settings -> Footer Options
  • Setup default Footer

Setup Menu

Go to WP dashboard -> Apprearance-> Menus

Setup Page

General Settings

In this section,
  • Set custom theme color
  • Set page layout
  • Assign login to any page
  • Assign login to the landing page
  • Disable WP login
  • Choose login template
  • Set API keys

Header Setting

In this section,
  • Set header
  • Upload logo for mobile and desktop
  • Set logo width and padding top for mobile
  • Enable or Disable user
  • Enable or Disable profile picture on default header
  • Enable or Disable search on the default header
  • Enable or Disable cart on default header

Footer Setting

Lenxel has two custom footers (Top footer and copyright footer).In this section,
  • Choose custom footer
  • Enable or Disable the top footer
  • Enable or Disable copyright text
  • Edit copyright text

Breadcrumb Setting

In this section,
  • Enable or Disable the breadcrumb title
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb padding-top
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb padding-bottom
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background color
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background color opacity
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background image
  • Upload breadcrumb background image
  • Choose breadcrumb text style
  • Choose breadcrumb text-align

Style Setting

In this section,
  • Choose body color
  • Choose link color
  • Choose the link hover color
  • Choose heading color
  • Choose background color
  • Upload background image
  • Choose background type
  • Choose the footer background color
  • Choose text color
  • Choose link color
  • Choose the link hover color
  • Choose the header background color
  • Choose the header text color
  • Choose the header active link color
  • Choose header hover link color
  • Choose the header mobile menu text color
  • Choose the dashboard sidebar background color
  • Choose the dashboard sidebar menu text color
  • Choose dashboard Sidebar Hover/Active Background Color

Typography Setting

Blog Setting

  • Choose a column for extra small, small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Default Archive Page Blog Sidebar Config
  • Choose Default Archive Page Blog Left Sidebar
  • Choose Default Archive Page Blog Right Sidebar
  • Set Blog Excerpt Limit
    Choose a single post layout.
  • Choose the default left sidebar for Single Post.
  • Choose the default right sidebar for Single Post.

Portfolio Setting

  • Choose a column for extra small, small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Default Archive Page Portfolio Sidebar Config
  • Choose Default Archive Page Portfolio Left Sidebar
  • Choose Default Archive Page Portfolio Right Sidebar
  • Set Blog Excerpt Limit
  • Choose a single portfolio layout.
  • Choose the default left sidebar for a Single portfolio.
  • Choose the default right sidebar for a Single portfolio.

Course Setting

  • Choose filter layout
  • Choose a column for extra small, small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Default Archive Page Page Sidebar Config
  • Choose Default Archive Page Page Left Sidebar
  • Choose Default Archive Page Page Right Sidebar
  • Choose Page title
  • Enable/Disable Course Category on Course Page
  • Enable/Disable Course View on Course Category/Tag Page
  • Breadcrumb Description

Dashboard Setting

  • Enable or Disable Announcement
  • Enable or Disable purchase history
  • Enable or Disable Withdrawals
  • Enable or Disable Header
  • Enable or Disable Registration Notification

Page Setting

  • Choose the default state for the page heading, shown/hidden.
  • Choose the default sidebar config for pages
  • Choose the default left sidebar for pages
  • Choose the default right sidebar for pages
  • Register image

Product Setting

  • Choose Products per page

Shop Setting

  • Choose the default product display layout for WooCommerce shop/category pages.
  • Choose a column for small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Woocommerce Sidebar Config
  • Choose Woocommerce on the Left Sidebar
  • Choose Woocommerce Right Sidebar
  • Enable or Disable the breadcrumb display title page
  • Choose breadcrumb padding-top
  • Choose breadcrumb padding-bottom
  • Choose a breadcrumb overlay background color
  • Choose breadcrumb overlay background color opacity
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background image
  • Choose breadcrumb text style
  • Choose breadcrumb text-align

Demo Importer

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Lenxel?

Lenxel is a WordPress-based learning management platform designed to help individuals and organizations create, manage, and deliver online courses and educational content. It allows learners to easily interact with learning materials.

How does Lenxel work?

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

Is Lenxel suitable for individuals and businesses?

Yes, Lenxel caters to both individual instructors, businesses or institutions looking to offer online courses. It can be used by teachers, coaches, trainers, and organizations of all sizes

What features does Lenxel offer?

Lenxel offers a range of features, including course creation tools, student management, assessments, progress tracking, multimedia support, payment integration, and customization options for branding and design.

Do I need to have technical expertise to use Lenxel?

No, Lenxel is designed to be user-friendly, and you don’t need advanced technical skills to use it. As an admin, If you’re familiar with WordPress, you should find it relatively easy to get started. Any instructor can work easily with Llenxel to create a course.

Can I sell courses on Lenxel?

Yes, Lenxel offers payment integration options, allowing you to sell your courses online. You can set your own pricing and choose from various payment gateways.

Is Lenxel mobile-friendly?

Yes, Lenxel is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring that your courses can be accessed on a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets.

Can I offer certificates for course completion?

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

Does Lenxel provide analytics and reporting tools?

Yes, Lenxel offers analytics and reporting features that help you track student progress, course performance, and other important metrics.

Is Lenxel secure and reliable?

We take security seriously. Lenxel provides features to protect your content and user data. Regular updates and support are also available to ensure reliability.

What kind of support does Lenxel offer?

Lenxel offers customer support, documentation, and tutorials to help users get the most out of the platform. You can get support through https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com.

Is Lenxel customizable to match my branding?

Yes, Lenxel often provides customization options, allowing you to match the platform’s appearance to your branding and style preferences.

Can I integrate Lenxel with other WordPress plugins and tools?

Lenxel is designed to work seamlessly with various WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing its functionality and customization options.

How can I get started with Lenxel?

To get started with Lenxel, you can visit our website or visit Envato to purchase a license as well and follow the installation and setup instructions provided in the documentation.

Hi, and welcome to the Lenxel User Guide.

Lenxel is a learning management system based on WordPress theme and plugins, it allows learners  to easily interact with learning materials and provides adequate follow-up progress on courses.

The User Guide covers all the information needed to use the Lenxel theme to build an amazing Learning management system, as well as some helpful tips and tricks that will make your experience working with the Lenxel theme easier and more enjoyable.

 

If you need any additional assistance while using our theme, you can always submit a quote to https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or chat with us through live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com and our support team will be glad to help you out.

What’s included

  • Plugins - contains all required plugins theme installation.
  • Demo - contains all sample content that allows the website to be imported manually.
  • Licensing - Contains text files license required for theme upgrade or support.
  • Guide - The folder is a contact document that guides you to install and setup the lenxel theme.
  • Lenxel - Contains the codes to install in the theme.

Tone of the two following installation methods:

","column_gap":{"unit":"px","size":0,"sizes":[]},"text_color":"#363A3F","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Outfit","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":24,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":36,"sizes":[]},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"40","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"typography_font_size_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2a044fbc","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

WordPress upload

For most users, this is probably the simplest installation method.  To install the Lenxel theme using this method, please follow these steps:
  • Login to your WordPress admin panel
  • Navigate to Appearance > Themes > Add New > Upload Theme
  • Click on Choose File and select lenxel.zip
  • Click on Install Now
","text_color":"#363A3F","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Outfit","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":24,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":36,"sizes":[]},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"16","right":"21","bottom":"16","left":"21","isLinked":false},"_background_background":"classic","_background_color":"#EFFAF4","typography_font_size_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]},"typography_line_height_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":24,"sizes":[]},"typography_line_height_mobile":{"unit":"px","size":"","sizes":[]},"_padding_tablet":{"unit":"px","top":"10","right":"10","bottom":"10","left":"10","isLinked":true}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"51ac64f5","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

FTP upload

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Extract the lenxel.zip file you previously located. You should now see a folder named lenxel
  • Using an FTP client, login to the server where your WordPress website is hosted
  • Using an FTP client, navigate to the /wp-content/themes/ directory under your WordPress website's root directory
  • Using an FTP client, upload the previously extracted lenxel folder to the themes directory on your remote server
  • Once the installation is complete, your Lenxel theme will be ready for use. Now all you need to do is navigate to Appearance > Themes and activate the Lenxel theme. After you have done this, click on the just activated theme or alternatively Apperance > install plugins to install and activate all the required plugins. After you have done this you should see Theme Setting appear in the left navigation bar of  your WordPress admin panel.

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Header Builder
  • Design your header with elementor (lnx logo, menu, search e.t.c) to suit your desire design  / Edit LNX Logo as desired.
  • Add and edit LNX Navigation Menu element on Header builder

Set Default header

  • Update logo(Theme setting > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Enable/Disable Search, Cart, Profile Photo(Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Setup Mobile logo (Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)

Activate Header Builder Design

  • Set the default header through WP dashboard -> Lnx Theme Settings -> Header Options > Header layout
  • Add, edit, and manage the header

Single page header setup

  • To set dynamic Headers for each page, go to the selected page and set the Footer

Questions","title_color":"#FFFFFF","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Poppins","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":36,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"700","typography_font_style":"normal","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"10","right":"15","bottom":"10","left":"30","isLinked":false},"_element_width":"initial","_element_custom_width":{"unit":"px","size":590,"sizes":[]},"_background_background":"classic","_background_color":"#135730","_border_radius":{"unit":"px","top":"10","right":"10","bottom":"10","left":"10","isLinked":true},"typography_font_size_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":24,"sizes":[]},"_element_width_tablet":"initial","_element_width_mobile":"initial","_element_custom_width_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":317.913999999999987267074175179004669189453125},"_element_custom_width_mobile":{"unit":"%","size":100}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"6b2d989c","elType":"widget","settings":{"tabs":[{"tab_title":"What is Lenxel?","tab_content":"

Lenxel is a WordPress-based learning management platform designed to help individuals and organizations create, manage, and deliver online courses and educational content. It allows learners  to easily interact with learning materials.

","_id":"8eefd40"},{"tab_title":"How does Lenxel work?","tab_content":"

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

","_id":"b51977f"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel suitable for individuals and businesses?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel caters to both individual instructors, businesses or institutions looking to offer online courses. It can be used by teachers, coaches, trainers, and organizations of all sizes

","_id":"f704d7e"},{"tab_title":"What features does Lenxel offer?","tab_content":"

Lenxel offers a range of features, including course creation tools, student management, assessments, progress tracking, multimedia support, payment integration, and customization options for branding and design.

","_id":"1e8ea4f"},{"tab_title":"Do I need to have technical expertise to use Lenxel?","tab_content":"

No, Lenxel is designed to be user-friendly, and you don't need advanced technical skills to use it. As an admin, If you're familiar with WordPress, you should find it relatively easy to get started. Any instructor can work easily with Llenxel to create a course.

","_id":"2155fd6"},{"tab_title":"Can I sell courses on Lenxel?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel offers payment integration options, allowing you to sell your courses online. You can set your own pricing and choose from various payment gateways.

","_id":"45321ad"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel mobile-friendly?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring that your courses can be accessed on a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets.

","_id":"d479db4"},{"tab_title":" Can I offer certificates for course completion?","tab_content":"

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

","_id":"fc6e4f4"},{"tab_title":"Does Lenxel provide analytics and reporting tools?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel offers analytics and reporting features that help you track student progress, course performance, and other important metrics.

","_id":"8f37884"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel secure and reliable?","tab_content":"

We take security seriously. Lenxel provides features to protect your content and user data. Regular updates and support are also available to ensure reliability.

","_id":"d36e616"},{"tab_title":" What kind of support does Lenxel offer?","tab_content":"

Lenxel offers customer support, documentation, and tutorials to help users get the most out of the platform. You can get support through https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or  live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com.

","_id":"7a773e3"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel customizable to match my branding?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel often provides customization options, allowing you to match the platform's appearance to your branding and style preferences.

","_id":"1fc39ce"},{"tab_title":" Can I integrate Lenxel with other WordPress plugins and tools?","tab_content":"

Lenxel is designed to work seamlessly with various WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing its functionality and customization options.

","_id":"782fd46"},{"tab_title":"How can I get started with Lenxel?","tab_content":"

To get started with Lenxel, you can visit our website or visit Envato to purchase a license as well  and follow the installation and setup instructions provided in the documentation.

Introduction

Hi, and welcome to the Lenxel User Guide.

Lenxel is a learning management system based on WordPress theme and plugins, it allows learners to easily interact with learning materials and provides adequate follow-up progress on courses.

The User Guide covers all the information needed to use the Lenxel theme to build an amazing Learning management system, as well as some helpful tips and tricks that will make your experience working with the Lenxel theme easier and more enjoyable.

If you need any additional assistance while using our theme, you can always submit a quote to https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or chat with us through live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com and our support team will be glad to help you out.

Support

Feel free to ask for help from our support team, all you have to do is submit your question via support@example.com If you are unable to find your answer here in our documentation

Requirements

  • PHP 7.x+
  • max_execution_time = 600
  • max_input_time = 1000
  • upload_max_filesize = 64M
  • post_max_size = 64M
  • memory_limit = 256M
  • max_input_vars = 1000
  • MySQL 5.6+
  • WordPress
  • Set permalink to support Lenxel theme by going to wp dashboard -> settings -> permalink, and check the radio box Post name. Click on the button Save Changes.

Whats included

  • Plugins - contains all required plugins theme installation.
  • Demo- contains all sample content that allows the website to be imported manually.
  • Licensing - Contains text files license required for theme upgrade or support.
  • Guide - The folder is a contact document that guides you to install and setup the lenxel theme.
  • Lenxel - Contains the codes to install in the theme.

Video Guide and Installation

Tone of the two following installation methods:

WordPress upload

For most users, this is probably the simplest installation method. To install the Lenxel theme using this method, please follow these steps:
  • Login to your WordPress admin panel
  • Navigate to Appearance > Themes > Add New > Upload Theme
  • Click on Choose File and select lenxel.zip
  • Click on Install Now

FTP upload

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Extract the lenxel.zip file you previously located. You should now see a folder named lenxel
  • Using an FTP client, login to the server where your WordPress website is hosted
  • Using an FTP client, navigate to the /wp-content/themes/ directory under your WordPress website's root directory
  • Using an FTP client, upload the previously extracted lenxel folder to the themes directory on your remote server
  • Once the installation is complete, your Lenxel theme will be ready for use. Now all you need to do is navigate to Appearance > Themes and activate the Lenxel theme. After you have done this, click on the just activated theme or alternatively Apperance > install plugins to install and activate all the required plugins. After you have done this you should see Theme Setting appear in the left navigation bar of your WordPress admin panel.

Setup Demo:

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Navigate to Theme Setting > demo importer Click on the import button to import the sample data.
https://www.loom.com/share/f1209892eac144b0b8638db4785af8e3?sid=99b1a08d-40dd-422f-a9ee-4b981ace3d04

Header Builder

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Header Builder
  • Design your header with elementor (lnx logo, menu, search e.t.c) to suit your desire design / Edit LNX Logo as desired.
  • Add and edit LNX Navigation Menu element on Header builder

Set Default header

  • Update logo(Theme setting > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Enable/Disable Search, Cart, Profile Photo(Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Setup Mobile logo (Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)

Activate Header Builder Design

  • Set the default header through WP dashboard -> Lnx Theme Settings -> Header Options > Header layout
  • Add, edit, and manage the header

Single page header setup

  • To set dynamic Headers for each page, go to the selected page and set the Footer

Footer Builder

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Theme Settings -> Footer Options
  • Setup default Footer

Setup Menu

Go to WP dashboard -> Apprearance-> Menus

Setup Page

General Settings

In this section,
  • Set custom theme color
  • Set page layout
  • Assign login to any page
  • Assign login to the landing page
  • Disable WP login
  • Choose login template
  • Set API keys

Header Setting

In this section,
  • Set header
  • Upload logo for mobile and desktop
  • Set logo width and padding top for mobile
  • Enable or Disable user
  • Enable or Disable profile picture on default header
  • Enable or Disable search on the default header
  • Enable or Disable cart on default header

Footer Setting

Lenxel has two custom footers (Top footer and copyright footer).In this section,
  • Choose custom footer
  • Enable or Disable the top footer
  • Enable or Disable copyright text
  • Edit copyright text

Breadcrumb Setting

In this section,
  • Enable or Disable the breadcrumb title
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb padding-top
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb padding-bottom
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background color
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background color opacity
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background image
  • Upload breadcrumb background image
  • Choose breadcrumb text style
  • Choose breadcrumb text-align

Style Setting

In this section,
  • Choose body color
  • Choose link color
  • Choose the link hover color
  • Choose heading color
  • Choose background color
  • Upload background image
  • Choose background type
  • Choose the footer background color
  • Choose text color

  • Choose the header background color

  • Choose header hover link color
  • Choose the header mobile menu text color
  • Choose the dashboard sidebar background color
  • Choose the dashboard sidebar menu text color
  • Choose dashboard Sidebar Hover/Active Background Color

Typography Setting

Blog Setting

  • Choose a column for extra small, small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Default Archive Page Blog Sidebar Config
  • Choose Default Archive Page Blog Left Sidebar
  • Choose Default Archive Page Blog Right Sidebar

    Choose a single post layout.

  • Choose the default right sidebar for Single Post.

Portfolio Setting

  • Choose a column for extra small, small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Default Archive Page Portfolio Sidebar Config

  • Choose Default Archive Page Portfolio Right Sidebar

  • Choose the default right sidebar for a Single portfolio.

Course Setting

  • Choose Default Archive Page Page Sidebar Config
  • Choose Default Archive Page Page Left Sidebar
  • Choose Default Archive Page Page Right Sidebar
  • Choose Page title
  • Enable/Disable Course Category on Course Page
  • Enable/Disable Course View on Course Category/Tag Page
  • Breadcrumb Description

Dashboard Setting

  • Enable or Disable Announcement
  • Enable or Disable purchase history
  • Enable or Disable Withdrawals
  • Enable or Disable Header
  • Enable or Disable Registration Notification

Page Setting

  • Choose the default state for the page heading, shown/hidden.
  • Choose the default sidebar config for pages
  • Choose the default left sidebar for pages
  • Choose the default right sidebar for pages
  • Register image

Product Setting

  • Choose Products per page

Shop Setting

  • Choose the default product display layout for WooCommerce shop/category pages.
  • Choose a column for small, medium, and larger screen
  • Choose Woocommerce Sidebar Config
  • Choose Woocommerce on the Left Sidebar
  • Choose Woocommerce Right Sidebar
  • Enable or Disable the breadcrumb display title page
  • Choose breadcrumb padding-top
  • Choose breadcrumb padding-bottom
  • Choose a breadcrumb overlay background color
  • Choose breadcrumb overlay background color opacity
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background image
  • Choose breadcrumb text style
  • Choose breadcrumb text-align

Demo Importer

Lenxel Dashboard

All Course Page

Enrolled Courses

My Courses > View

Courses

Add Course:
  • Go to WP Dashboard > tutor > Courses click Add New
  • Or on the WP menu > New > Course
Edit Course:
  • The theme has these features shown in the image

Certificate

Announcement

  • To enable announcements on the course content, go to WP dashboard > Lnx Theme Settings > Dashboard Options > Enable Announcement, and click on the switch button.
  • The announcements will now be visible on the course lessons page

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Lenxel?

Lenxel is a WordPress-based learning management platform designed to help individuals and organizations create, manage, and deliver online courses and educational content. It allows learners to easily interact with learning materials.

How does Lenxel work?

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

Is Lenxel suitable for individuals and businesses?

Yes, Lenxel caters to both individual instructors, businesses or institutions looking to offer online courses. It can be used by teachers, coaches, trainers, and organizations of all sizes

What features does Lenxel offer?

Lenxel offers a range of features, including course creation tools, student management, assessments, progress tracking, multimedia support, payment integration, and customization options for branding and design.

Do I need to have technical expertise to use Lenxel?

No, Lenxel is designed to be user-friendly, and you don’t need advanced technical skills to use it. As an admin, If you’re familiar with WordPress, you should find it relatively easy to get started. Any instructor can work easily with Llenxel to create a course.

Can I sell courses on Lenxel?

Yes, Lenxel offers payment integration options, allowing you to sell your courses online. You can set your own pricing and choose from various payment gateways.

Is Lenxel mobile-friendly?

Yes, Lenxel is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring that your courses can be accessed on a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets.

Can I offer certificates for course completion?

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

Does Lenxel provide analytics and reporting tools?

Yes, Lenxel offers analytics and reporting features that help you track student progress, course performance, and other important metrics.

Is Lenxel secure and reliable?

We take security seriously. Lenxel provides features to protect your content and user data. Regular updates and support are also available to ensure reliability.

What kind of support does Lenxel offer?

Lenxel offers customer support, documentation, and tutorials to help users get the most out of the platform. You can get support through https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com.

Is Lenxel customizable to match my branding?

Yes, Lenxel often provides customization options, allowing you to match the platform’s appearance to your branding and style preferences.

Can I integrate Lenxel with other WordPress plugins and tools?

Lenxel is designed to work seamlessly with various WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing its functionality and customization options.

How can I get started with Lenxel?

To get started with Lenxel, you can visit our website or visit Envato to purchase a license as well and follow the installation and setup instructions provided in the documentation.

Hi, and welcome to the Lenxel User Guide.

Lenxel is a learning management system based on WordPress theme and plugins, it allows learners  to easily interact with learning materials and provides adequate follow-up progress on courses.

The User Guide covers all the information needed to use the Lenxel theme to build an amazing Learning management system, as well as some helpful tips and tricks that will make your experience working with the Lenxel theme easier and more enjoyable.

 

If you need any additional assistance while using our theme, you can always submit a quote to https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or chat with us through live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com and our support team will be glad to help you out.

What’s included

  • Plugins - contains all required plugins theme installation.
  • Demo - contains all sample content that allows the website to be imported manually.
  • Licensing - Contains text files license required for theme upgrade or support.
  • Guide - The folder is a contact document that guides you to install and setup the lenxel theme.
  • Lenxel - Contains the codes to install in the theme.

WordPress upload

For most users, this is probably the simplest installation method.  To install the Lenxel theme using this method, please follow these steps:
  • Login to your WordPress admin panel
  • Navigate to Appearance > Themes > Add New > Upload Theme
  • Click on Choose File and select lenxel.zip
  • Click on Install Now

FTP upload

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Extract the lenxel.zip file you previously located. You should now see a folder named lenxel
  • Using an FTP client, login to the server where your WordPress website is hosted
  • Using an FTP client, navigate to the /wp-content/themes/ directory under your WordPress website's root directory
  • Using an FTP client, upload the previously extracted lenxel folder to the themes directory on your remote server
  • Once the installation is complete, your Lenxel theme will be ready for use. Now all you need to do is navigate to Appearance > Themes and activate the Lenxel theme. After you have done this, click on the just activated theme or alternatively Apperance > install plugins to install and activate all the required plugins. After you have done this you should see Theme Setting appear in the left navigation bar of  your WordPress admin panel.

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Header Builder
  • Design your header with elementor (lnx logo, menu, search e.t.c) to suit your desire design  / Edit LNX Logo as desired.
  • Add and edit LNX Navigation Menu element on Header builder

Set Default header

  • Update logo(Theme setting > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Enable/Disable Search, Cart, Profile Photo(Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Setup Mobile logo (Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)

Activate Header Builder Design

  • Set the default header through WP dashboard -> Lnx Theme Settings -> Header Options > Header layout
  • Add, edit, and manage the header

Single page header setup

  • To set dynamic Headers for each page, go to the selected page and set the Footer

is Lenxel?","tab_content":"

Lenxel is a WordPress-based learning management platform designed to help individuals and organizations create, manage, and deliver online courses and educational content. It allows learners  to easily interact with learning materials.

","_id":"8eefd40"},{"tab_title":"How does Lenxel work?","tab_content":"

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

","_id":"b51977f"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel suitable for individuals and businesses?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel caters to both individual instructors, businesses or institutions looking to offer online courses. It can be used by teachers, coaches, trainers, and organizations of all sizes

","_id":"f704d7e"},{"tab_title":"What features does Lenxel offer?","tab_content":"

Lenxel offers a range of features, including course creation tools, student management, assessments, progress tracking, multimedia support, payment integration, and customization options for branding and design.

","_id":"1e8ea4f"},{"tab_title":"Do I need to have technical expertise to use Lenxel?","tab_content":"

No, Lenxel is designed to be user-friendly, and you don't need advanced technical skills to use it. As an admin, If you're familiar with WordPress, you should find it relatively easy to get started. Any instructor can work easily with Llenxel to create a course.

","_id":"2155fd6"},{"tab_title":"Can I sell courses on Lenxel?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel offers payment integration options, allowing you to sell your courses online. You can set your own pricing and choose from various payment gateways.

","_id":"45321ad"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel mobile-friendly?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring that your courses can be accessed on a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets.

","_id":"d479db4"},{"tab_title":" Can I offer certificates for course completion?","tab_content":"

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

","_id":"fc6e4f4"},{"tab_title":"Does Lenxel provide analytics and reporting tools?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel offers analytics and reporting features that help you track student progress, course performance, and other important metrics.

","_id":"8f37884"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel secure and reliable?","tab_content":"

We take security seriously. Lenxel provides features to protect your content and user data. Regular updates and support are also available to ensure reliability.

","_id":"d36e616"},{"tab_title":" What kind of support does Lenxel offer?","tab_content":"

Lenxel offers customer support, documentation, and tutorials to help users get the most out of the platform. You can get support through https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or  live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com.

","_id":"7a773e3"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel customizable to match my branding?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel often provides customization options, allowing you to match the platform's appearance to your branding and style preferences.

","_id":"1fc39ce"},{"tab_title":" Can I integrate Lenxel with other WordPress plugins and tools?","tab_content":"

Lenxel is designed to work seamlessly with various WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing its functionality and customization options.

","_id":"782fd46"},{"tab_title":"How can I get started with Lenxel?","tab_content":"

To get started with Lenxel, you can visit our website or visit Envato to purchase a license as well  and follow the installation and setup instructions provided in the documentation.

Introduction

Hi, and welcome to the Lenxel User Guide.

Lenxel is a learning management system based on WordPress theme and plugins, it allows learners to easily interact with learning materials and provides adequate follow-up progress on courses.

The User Guide covers all the information needed to use the Lenxel theme to build an amazing Learning management system, as well as some helpful tips and tricks that will make your experience working with the Lenxel theme easier and more enjoyable.

If you need any additional assistance while using our theme, you can always submit a quote to https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or chat with us through live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com and our support team will be glad to help you out.

Support

Feel free to ask for help from our support team, all you have to do is submit your question via support@example.com If you are unable to find your answer here in our documentation

Requirements

  • PHP 7.x+
  • max_execution_time = 600
  • max_input_time = 1000
  • upload_max_filesize = 64M
  • post_max_size = 64M
  • memory_limit = 256M
  • max_input_vars = 1000
  • MySQL 5.6+
  • WordPress
  • Set permalink to support Lenxel theme by going to wp dashboard -> settings -> permalink, and check the radio box Post name. Click on the button Save Changes.

Whats included

  • Plugins - contains all required plugins theme installation.
  • Demo- contains all sample content that allows the website to be imported manually.
  • Licensing - Contains text files license required for theme upgrade or support.
  • Guide - The folder is a contact document that guides you to install and setup the lenxel theme.
  • Lenxel - Contains the codes to install in the theme.

Video Guide and Installation

Tone of the two following installation methods:

WordPress upload

For most users, this is probably the simplest installation method. To install the Lenxel theme using this method, please follow these steps:
  • Login to your WordPress admin panel
  • Navigate to Appearance > Themes > Add New > Upload Theme
  • Click on Choose File and select lenxel.zip
  • Click on Install Now

FTP upload

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Extract the lenxel.zip file you previously located. You should now see a folder named lenxel
  • Using an FTP client, login to the server where your WordPress website is hosted
  • Using an FTP client, navigate to the /wp-content/themes/ directory under your WordPress website's root directory
  • Using an FTP client, upload the previously extracted lenxel folder to the themes directory on your remote server
  • Once the installation is complete, your Lenxel theme will be ready for use. Now all you need to do is navigate to Appearance > Themes and activate the Lenxel theme. After you have done this, click on the just activated theme or alternatively Apperance > install plugins to install and activate all the required plugins. After you have done this you should see Theme Setting appear in the left navigation bar of your WordPress admin panel.

Setup Demo:

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Navigate to Theme Setting > demo importer Click on the import button to import the sample data.
https://www.loom.com/share/f1209892eac144b0b8638db4785af8e3?sid=99b1a08d-40dd-422f-a9ee-4b981ace3d04

Header Builder

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Header Builder
  • Design your header with elementor (lnx logo, menu, search e.t.c) to suit your desire design / Edit LNX Logo as desired.
  • Add and edit LNX Navigation Menu element on Header builder

Set Default header

  • Update logo(Theme setting > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Enable/Disable Search, Cart, Profile Photo(Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Setup Mobile logo (Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)

Activate Header Builder Design

  • Set the default header through WP dashboard -> Lnx Theme Settings -> Header Options > Header layout
  • Add, edit, and manage the header

Single page header setup

  • To set dynamic Headers for each page, go to the selected page and set the Footer

Footer Builder

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Theme Settings -> Footer Options
  • Setup default Footer

Setup Menu

Go to WP dashboard -> Apprearance-> Menus

Setup Page

General Settings

In this section,
  • Set custom theme color
  • Set page layout
  • Assign login to any page
  • Assign login to the landing page
  • Disable WP login
  • Choose login template
  • Set API keys

Header Setting

In this section,
  • Set header
  • Upload logo for mobile and desktop
  • Set logo width and padding top for mobile
  • Enable or Disable user
  • Enable or Disable profile picture on default header
  • Enable or Disable search on the default header
  • Enable or Disable cart on default header

Footer Setting

Lenxel has two custom footers (Top footer and copyright footer).In this section,
  • Choose custom footer
  • Enable or Disable the top footer
  • Enable or Disable copyright text
  • Edit copyright text

Breadcrumb Setting

In this section,
  • Enable or Disable the breadcrumb title
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb padding-top
  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb padding-bottom

  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background image

  • Choose breadcrumb text-align

Style Setting

In this section,

  • Choose the default right sidebar for Single Post.

Portfolio Setting

  • Enable/Disable Course View on Course Category/Tag Page

Dashboard Setting

Page Setting

  • Choose the default left sidebar for pages
  • Choose the default right sidebar for pages

Product Setting

Shop Setting

  • Choose Woocommerce Right Sidebar

  • Choose a breadcrumb overlay background color

  • Enable or Disable breadcrumb overlay background image

Demo Importer

Lenxel Dashboard

My Courses > View

Courses

Add Course:
  • Go to WP Dashboard > tutor > Courses click Add New
  • Or on the WP menu > New > Course
Edit Course:
  • The theme has these features shown in the image

Certificate

Announcement

  • To enable announcements on the course content, go to WP dashboard > Lnx Theme Settings > Dashboard Options > Enable Announcement, and click on the switch button.
  • The announcements will now be visible on the course lessons page

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Lenxel?

Lenxel is a WordPress-based learning management platform designed to help individuals and organizations create, manage, and deliver online courses and educational content. It allows learners to easily interact with learning materials.

How does Lenxel work?

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

Is Lenxel suitable for individuals and businesses?

Yes, Lenxel caters to both individual instructors, businesses or institutions looking to offer online courses. It can be used by teachers, coaches, trainers, and organizations of all sizes

What features does Lenxel offer?

Lenxel offers a range of features, including course creation tools, student management, assessments, progress tracking, multimedia support, payment integration, and customization options for branding and design.

Do I need to have technical expertise to use Lenxel?

No, Lenxel is designed to be user-friendly, and you don’t need advanced technical skills to use it. As an admin, If you’re familiar with WordPress, you should find it relatively easy to get started. Any instructor can work easily with Llenxel to create a course.

Can I sell courses on Lenxel?

Yes, Lenxel offers payment integration options, allowing you to sell your courses online. You can set your own pricing and choose from various payment gateways.

Is Lenxel mobile-friendly?

Yes, Lenxel is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring that your courses can be accessed on a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets.

Can I offer certificates for course completion?

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

Does Lenxel provide analytics and reporting tools?

Yes, Lenxel offers analytics and reporting features that help you track student progress, course performance, and other important metrics.

Is Lenxel secure and reliable?

We take security seriously. Lenxel provides features to protect your content and user data. Regular updates and support are also available to ensure reliability.

What kind of support does Lenxel offer?

Lenxel offers customer support, documentation, and tutorials to help users get the most out of the platform. You can get support through https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com.

Is Lenxel customizable to match my branding?

Yes, Lenxel often provides customization options, allowing you to match the platform’s appearance to your branding and style preferences.

Can I integrate Lenxel with other WordPress plugins and tools?

Lenxel is designed to work seamlessly with various WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing its functionality and customization options.

How can I get started with Lenxel?

To get started with Lenxel, you can visit our website or visit Envato to purchase a license as well and follow the installation and setup instructions provided in the documentation.

Hi, and welcome to the Lenxel User Guide.

Lenxel is a learning management system based on WordPress theme and plugins, it allows learners  to easily interact with learning materials and provides adequate follow-up progress on courses.

The User Guide covers all the information needed to use the Lenxel theme to build an amazing Learning management system, as well as some helpful tips and tricks that will make your experience working with the Lenxel theme easier and more enjoyable.

 

If you need any additional assistance while using our theme, you can always submit a quote to https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or chat with us through live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com and our support team will be glad to help you out.

What’s included

  • Plugins - contains all required plugins theme installation.
  • Demo - contains all sample content that allows the website to be imported manually.
  • Licensing - Contains text files license required for theme upgrade or support.
  • Guide - The folder is a contact document that guides you to install and setup the lenxel theme.
  • Lenxel - Contains the codes to install in the theme.

","column_gap":{"unit":"px","size":0,"sizes":[]},"text_color":"#363A3F","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Outfit","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":24,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":36,"sizes":[]},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"40","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"typography_font_size_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"665af4c8","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

WordPress upload

For most users, this is probably the simplest installation method.  To install the Lenxel theme using this method, please follow these steps:
  • Login to your WordPress admin panel
  • Navigate to Appearance > Themes > Add New > Upload Theme
  • Click on Choose File and select lenxel.zip
  • Click on Install Now

FTP upload

If you would like to install the Lenxel theme via FTP, please follow these steps:
  • Extract the lenxel.zip file you previously located. You should now see a folder named lenxel
  • Using an FTP client, login to the server where your WordPress website is hosted
  • Using an FTP client, navigate to the /wp-content/themes/ directory under your WordPress website's root directory
  • Using an FTP client, upload the previously extracted lenxel folder to the themes directory on your remote server
  • Once the installation is complete, your Lenxel theme will be ready for use. Now all you need to do is navigate to Appearance > Themes and activate the Lenxel theme. After you have done this, click on the just activated theme or alternatively Apperance > install plugins to install and activate all the required plugins. After you have done this you should see Theme Setting appear in the left navigation bar of  your WordPress admin panel.

  • Go to WP dashboard -> Header Builder
  • Design your header with elementor (lnx logo, menu, search e.t.c) to suit your desire design  / Edit LNX Logo as desired.
  • Add and edit LNX Navigation Menu element on Header builder

Set Default header

  • Update logo(Theme setting > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Enable/Disable Search, Cart, Profile Photo(Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)
  • Setup Mobile logo (Lnx Theme Settings > Header option > logo in header default)

Activate Header Builder Design

  • Set the default header through WP dashboard -> Lnx Theme Settings -> Header Options > Header layout
  • Add, edit, and manage the header

Single page header setup

  • To set dynamic Headers for each page, go to the selected page and set the Footer

is Lenxel?","tab_content":"

Lenxel is a WordPress-based learning management platform designed to help individuals and organizations create, manage, and deliver online courses and educational content. It allows learners  to easily interact with learning materials.

","_id":"8eefd40"},{"tab_title":"How does Lenxel work?","tab_content":"

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

","_id":"b51977f"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel suitable for individuals and businesses?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel caters to both individual instructors, businesses or institutions looking to offer online courses. It can be used by teachers, coaches, trainers, and organizations of all sizes

","_id":"f704d7e"},{"tab_title":"What features does Lenxel offer?","tab_content":"

Lenxel offers a range of features, including course creation tools, student management, assessments, progress tracking, multimedia support, payment integration, and customization options for branding and design.

","_id":"1e8ea4f"},{"tab_title":"Do I need to have technical expertise to use Lenxel?","tab_content":"

No, Lenxel is designed to be user-friendly, and you don't need advanced technical skills to use it. As an admin, If you're familiar with WordPress, you should find it relatively easy to get started. Any instructor can work easily with Llenxel to create a course.

","_id":"2155fd6"},{"tab_title":"Can I sell courses on Lenxel?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel offers payment integration options, allowing you to sell your courses online. You can set your own pricing and choose from various payment gateways.

","_id":"45321ad"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel mobile-friendly?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring that your courses can be accessed on a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets.

","_id":"d479db4"},{"tab_title":" Can I offer certificates for course completion?","tab_content":"

Lenxel integratesd into your WordPress website to provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing online courses. You can create and organize course content, enroll students, track their progress, and more.

","_id":"fc6e4f4"},{"tab_title":"Does Lenxel provide analytics and reporting tools?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel offers analytics and reporting features that help you track student progress, course performance, and other important metrics.

","_id":"8f37884"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel secure and reliable?","tab_content":"

We take security seriously. Lenxel provides features to protect your content and user data. Regular updates and support are also available to ensure reliability.

","_id":"d36e616"},{"tab_title":" What kind of support does Lenxel offer?","tab_content":"

Lenxel offers customer support, documentation, and tutorials to help users get the most out of the platform. You can get support through https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com/contact or  live chat on https://lenxel.ogunlabs.com.

","_id":"7a773e3"},{"tab_title":"Is Lenxel customizable to match my branding?","tab_content":"

Yes, Lenxel often provides customization options, allowing you to match the platform's appearance to your branding and style preferences.

","_id":"1fc39ce"},{"tab_title":" Can I integrate Lenxel with other WordPress plugins and tools?","tab_content":"

Lenxel is designed to work seamlessly with various WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing its functionality and customization options.

","_id":"782fd46"},{"tab_title":"How can I get started with Lenxel?","tab_content":"

To get started with Lenxel, you can visit our website or visit Envato to purchase a license as well  and follow the installation and setup instructions provided in the documentation.

item.title: Webflow Essentials: Beginner's Guide to Building Beautiful Websites-clone
item.dc:creator: tochukwu
item.content:encoded:
Course Description

Are you a creative individual looking to take your ideas to the next level? If you're tired of running out of inspiration, we have the perfect solution for you! Join our Skillshare course led by AI expert Jesper Dramsch, where you'll explore the exciting world of generative AI and discover how ChatGPT can revolutionize your content creation process. Itdoesnt matter if you're a writer, blogger, social media influencer, or any type of content creator, this course is tailored to provide you with the tools and knowledge to keep your ideas flowing endlessly. Dive into the inner workings of ChatGPT, unlock its full potential, and find your unique voice in the realm of AI-assisted writing. Throughout the course, you'll uncover the mysteries of large language models, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and machine learning. Gain valuable insights into how ChatGPT generates creative and coherent responses, and learn to leverage its capabilities to generate an abundance of content ideas. But that's not all! You'll also explore the ethical considerations surrounding generative AI, developing a deeper understanding of the technology behind ChatGPT. Jesper will guide you through practical exercises and provide expert tips to help you make the most of this powerful AI writing tool. As a special bonus, you'll receive Jesper's ebook, "chatGPT for Creatives and Content Creators," serving as a valuable resource to reinforce what you've learned throughout the course. Are you ready to unlock your creative potential and elevate your content creation to new heights? Enroll in the course today and become a master of AI-assisted writing with ChatGPT. Let your imagination soar like never before!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Playful Exploration of AI Writing What's Under the Hood of ChatGPT? Find your voice with ChatGPT The Future of AI & Content Creation Content Co-Creation with ChatGPT

item.title: Intro to Science 1
item.dc:creator: wahab
item.content:encoded:
What is Lorem Ipsum?

Lorem Ipsumis simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

Why do we use it?

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

Where does it come from?

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham

item.title: Definition of Statistics
item.dc:creator: instructor@example.com
item.content:encoded: Statistics is the study and manipulation of data, including ways to gather, review, analyze, and draw conclusions from data. The two major areas of statistics are descriptive and inferential statistics.

item.title: Importance of Statistics in Various Fieldsx
item.dc:creator: instructor@example.com
item.content:encoded:
Statistics can be used to predict the future, determine the probability that a specific event will happen, or help answer questions about a survey. Statistics is used in many different fields such as business, medicine, biology, psychology and social sciences.

Descriptive vs. Inferential Statistics

What is the main difference between descriptive and inferential statistics? Descriptive statistics summarize and describe data, while inferential statistics draw conclusions and make predictions about populations based on sample data.

item.title: Introduction to AI Acceleration
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded: Expensive to build and often needing highly skilled engineers to maintain, artificial intelligence systems generally only pay off for large tech companies with vast amounts of data. But what if your local pizza shop could use AI to predict which flavor would sell best each day of the week? Andrew Ng shares a vision for democratizing access to AI, empowering any business to make decisions that will increase their profit and productivity. Learn how we could build a richer society all with just a few self-provided data points.

item.title: Ideation and Conceptualization
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded: In this module, students will learn how to generate innovative AI startup ideas using ChatGPT. They will also discover methods to evaluate the feasibility and market potential of their ideas, ensuring they start with a strong foundation.

item.title: Market Research and Validation
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded: This module dives into the crucial aspect of market research for AI startups. Students will explore methods to identify their target audience, analyze competitors, and validate their AI solutions with potential customers to ensure there's a demand for their product or service.

item.title: Building Your AI Prototype
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded: Here, students will learn how to turn their AI ideas into tangible prototypes using ChatGPT and other relevant tools. They will also delve into the decision-making process of selecting the right technology stack for their AI solution.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: tochukwu
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we cant offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Landing page
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded:
Make your life easier with the online learning

Experience a new era of education with MasterClass Pro, the ultimate e-learning tech product designed to unlock your full potential.

Start Learning

Advance your skills and learn from experts

Learn from the best in the industry as we explore the art of UI/UX design, unraveling the secrets behind impactful creations and how they shape user experiences. Elevate your skills and join us on a journey to master the craft from seasoned experts

Start Learning

Effective Classes

Experience the effectiveness of our transformative classes, where we blend real-world case studies, interactive learning, and direct mentorship

Expert Tutors

Learn from our team of expert tutors who bring a wealth of industry experience and knowledge to guide you

Online Learning

Take control of your learning journey, make it highly adaptable to meet your unique needs and circumstances.

Explore online courses for you

Explore a diverse range of online courses tailored just for you.

item.content:encoded:
Impacting Lives through learning

Our comprehensive Learning Management System is specifically designed to cater to tech enthusiasts of all levels, from beginners to seasoned professionals.

Dedicated to improve your skills

we are passionate about fostering a culture of learning and growth. Our platform is designed to empower learners of all backgrounds to pursue their educational aspirations and unlock their full potential. Here's what sets us apart:

At Lenxel, we believe in the power of technology to shape the future. Our carefully curated courses cover a wide range of tech disciplines, from programming and data science to cybersecurity and artificial intelligence. Whether you're seeking to kickstart a tech career, upskill in your current role, or simply satisfy your curiosity, our platform offers a dynamic and flexible learning experience.

0 + Classes 0 K+ Members 0 + Teachers

Meet the Team

Alex Benneth

Web Developer

Maya Patel

Snr. Product Designer

Ryan Mitchell

Market Strategist

Emily Walker

A.I specialist

Advance your skills
and learn from experts

Learn from the best in the industry as we explore the art of UI/UX design, unraveling the secrets behind impactful creations and how they shape user experiences. Elevate your skills and join us on a journey to master the craft from seasoned experts

Start Learning

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: tochukwu
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Introduction
item.dc:creator: info@example.com
item.content:encoded: General overview of what QA is about. Quality assurance is the secret of a successful software release. Practicing QA results in fewer bugs, happier customers, and more robust software. Learning the essentials of QA can save you big on production costs, and lead to more efficient development life cycles.

item.content:encoded: General overview of what QA is about. Quality assurance is the secret of a successful software release. Practicing QA results in fewer bugs, happier customers, and more robust software. Learning the essentials of QA can save you big on production costs, and lead to more efficient development life cycles.

item.title: Introduction to AI Acceleration
item.dc:creator: akpan
item.content:encoded: Expensive to build and often needing highly skilled engineers to maintain, artificial intelligence systems generally only pay off for large tech companies with vast amounts of data. But what if your local pizza shop could use AI to predict which flavor would sell best each day of the week? Andrew Ng shares a vision for democratizing access to AI, empowering any business to make decisions that will increase their profit and productivity. Learn how we could build a richer society all with just a few self-provided data points.

item.content:encoded: What is Lorem Ipsum? Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
